Package de.codescape.bitvunit.report

Provides reporting functionality.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ReportWriter Common interface for any class that writes out reports for this framework.
 

Class Summary
AbstractReportWriter Abstract class that should be extended by all ReportWriter implementations to support writing reports to files and writing to console.
ReportingContext Singleton class holding the configured ReportWriter to write out reports for any accessibility check that is executed by the framework.
TextReportWriter Implementation of ReportWriter that writes text only based reports.
XmlReportWriter Implementation of ReportWriter that writes XML based reports.
 

Package de.codescape.bitvunit.report Description

Provides reporting functionality.
